body.p: The gp_interfaces table contains information about network interfaces on segment hosts. This information, joined with data from , is used by the system to optimize the usage of available network interfaces for various purposes, including fault detection.

row.entry: System-assigned ID. The unique identifier of a network interface.
Hostname address for the segment host containing the network interface. Can be a numeric IP address or a hostname.
Status for the network interface. A value of 0 indicates that the interface is unavailable.
